name: mao-rn-android-kit
author: maolion.j@gmail.com
description: 为 React Native 开发 提供的一些Android原生模块/组件 (react native, CoordinatorLayout, AppBarLayout, TabLayout, NestedScrollView, PopupWindow)

scripts.publish-to-example: npm run build && rimraf ./example/node_modules/mao-rn-android-kit && mkdir ./example/node_modules/mao-rn-android-kit && cp -r ./dist ./example/node_modules/mao-rn-android-kit && cp package.json ./example/node_modules/mao-rn-android-kit
